message: I don't think I have just one favorite.  The most used on my iPhone 4 are probably Hootsuite, Words w/ Friends, Instagram, SportsTap, Pandora, TuneIn Radio, MapQuest 4 Mobile and I'm sure there's a few others.  The Convore app is pretty good too.
yeah after i wrote the question it hit me it would be difficult to choose just one...
Twitter just got boring to me. I checked it instinctively but didn't get anything out of it really.
What I'm saying is I like looking out of the window on the bus :-)
android - tune sync, songbird, go facebook chat, dolphin, fandango, clearcheckbook, words with friends, and twidroid
I think convore is actually my most used app behind mail. Killed twitter last Friday.
twitter was my backup to pownce.. so far i dont really have a backup to twitter
Actually to be fair there's some people on there I miss day to day but it's not people I've met in person
ComicZeal, MyWi, Mail, Weather Channel+, Flipboard
iPod Touch: Chaos Rings (RPG), Nike Training Club (pocket personal trainer) and Tiny Wings (a game cuter and more addictive than Angry Birds)
I'm on an Android device and I'd have to say: Dolphin Browser HD, ConnectBot, Reddit is Fun, Reddit Pics Pro, DoggCatcher, and TweetDeck

Let's see....Plume, Taptu/Pulse, PicPlz, Swype, Kindle, Convorsation, Craigslist notification and been getting into Read it later lately. That is just right now, I am sure I will be into a bunch others one week from now
but Picasa is the best thing since XV, love the face db
